app.title: What is your shoulder age?
app.subtitle: AI shoulder function test that precisely visualizes 'joint age' with a 3-minute measurement

landing.description: Currently, as a free pre-launch trial event, we provide accurate status analysis and a physical report on-site.

personalInfo.title: Enter Personal Information
personalInfo.description: We request minimal basic information for accurate 'shoulder age' calculation and individual function analysis. The name you enter will only be used for report notation, and all information will be processed anonymously within the internal system. This information will not be used for any purpose other than providing accurate results and enhancing analysis. It will be destroyed immediately upon request.
personalInfo.name: Name

result.title: Survey Complete, What are Your Results?
result.thankYou: Thank you for participating in the survey!
result.nextStep1: Please ask the nearby operator how to enter the PIN.
result.nextStep2: Now, we will begin a precise analysis of shoulder function.
result.description1: ① AI motion analysis, applying PCT international patent technology, precisely measures neck and shoulder angles, range of motion, and symmetry.
result.description2: ② The algorithm is built based on clinical research, medical papers, and standardized movement data.
result.description3: ③ The accuracy of angle and range of motion analysis during motion capture has been verified to be over 80%, ensuring reliability.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.loadError: An error occurred while loading data
